[[Image:Haywood_moyer_pettibone.jpg|thumb|left
  +
| 1907 photo of defendants [[Charles Moyer]], Bill Haywood, and [[George Pettibone]]]]
'''Charles Moyer''' was president of the [[Western Federation of Miners]]. He was implicated in the 1905 assassination of [[Frank Steunenberg]], ex-governor of Idaho. He was represented by [[Clarence Darrow]], the most renowned lawyer of the day. Due to lack of evidence, he was acquitted.
'''Charles Moyer''' was president of the [[Western Federation of Miners]]. He was implicated in the 1905 assassination of [[Frank Steunenberg]], ex-governor of Idaho. He was represented by [[Clarence Darrow]], the most renowned lawyer of the day. Due to lack of evidence, he was acquitted.
